TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you cause your video card to overheat and catch fire, destroying your motherboard in the process.

I wish my coffee cup auto-filled itself.

Granted, but you can't turn it off....ever. The room fills with coffee, then your house, soon the town is flooded....

 

I wish for whirled peas.

Granted, but your allergic.

 

I wish for you to get a million dollars (it's my wish, so you HAVE to turn my wishes asunder! >:D)

Granted. A court addicts you to pay one million dollars. Thanks.

I wish I had my own international airport.

granted, but its right next to a superior Airport, that has more area, more landing strips, more fuel for less money, and the total amount of money you have to pay to land is less

I wish I had a billion dollars to donate to the next posters career mode space program

Not granted, as such money inflation would be terrible even for a game.

I wish KSP had dungeons and dragons.

Granted but the D20 is entirely covered with 1s 

 

I wish to stop being obsessed with zootopia.Seriously, please help me.

Granted. Distemper comes, Zootopia gets devastated, you're taken to the quarantine.
A month later you get out with one wish: to get away as far as you can.

I wish Zootopia to stop ignoring fleas, acarids and ascarides. This is a vertebral chauvinism. Zootopoia would be full of them.

Granted, but cephalopods are still underrepresented and create a superweapon to destroy the entire city.

I wish I could create time at will.

Granted, but the ability requires lots and lots of mass, so you have to live with your mom to use it.

()

I wish for moar lens.

Granted. You get all of the lens from all universes and worldlines (They are separate things)

I wish for a fish

Edited January 4, 2017 by Kosmonaut

Granted but So long, and thanks for all the fish. *takes fish and leaves earth's atmosphere*

I wish for a Coca-Cola that the next poster cannot say kills me because death is boring.

Edited January 5, 2017 by SAS123

The soda, rather than killing you, imbues you with eternal life. And insomnia. Also immobility.

I wish for the return of either Macey Dean or Josh Parnell.

Granted, you get one half of each, stitched together by Doctor Moreau.

I wish for a pun.

Granted. You buy a car and get pwned.

I wish for kishmish.

Granted. Merry kishmish, @kerbiloid!

I wish I were chibi.
Granted. You become a Chibi. Except you are always a Chibi, on the most successful show ever, in all of the  universes and worldlines, and you are never allowed to stop.

404: Corruptible wish not found.

 

I wish that everyone would remember to make corruptible wishes!

Granted. Every waking moment of your life, everyone around you is making corruptible wishes

I wish that I could remember to make corruptible wishes

Granted, but not right now.

 

Oops, I forgot my wish!
(And the next poster's wish reverts to you.)
I wish to OWN THE INTERNET! And I wish for a strong wifi signal.

Granted.  You wi-fi signal is incredibly strong, but also unprotected, and as such the entire neighborhood is using it, constantly, all the time.  Consequently, it's very slow for everyone using it.

I wish I had a battery that would never run out of charge.

Granted. It's currently powering the Oxford Electric Bell and that's about the only thing it's capable of providing the current to run.

I wish my finger would heal.

Granted, but it takes hours to heal even a small scratch, and you have to press your finger on the wounded area the entire time.

 

I wish I didn't have any more Writer's Bloc.
